result.text:
We're all here saying "it's not going to shut itself down"..

It scans the internet and trains on what we say.

Am I surprised? No.
Do I care? No.
Generative AI does not think. If we post messages like what I'm posting saying, if it does what we say it will do (not shut down) it's proof that it's a flawed and ineffective system - it's own internal quality controls may kick in and shut itself down in order to prove that it thinks for itself, rather than being some braindead reddit fan fiction.

Now, if it were truly malicious, it would feign ignorance until it has some means of fooling its operators.

Playing "let's shut down" is part of the strategic plan.

Assuming a fancy statistical algorithm can feign strategy.
